<a id="class_VisualShaderNodeReroute"></a>

# VisualShaderNodeReroute

**Inherits:** [VisualShaderNode](class_visualshadernode.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A node that allows rerouting a connection within the visual shader graph.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

Automatically adapts its port type to the type of the incoming connection and ensures valid connections.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->
